comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: Frank Abarno [1891-1978, (called Arbano in Times story), 22, one of the Italian anarchist bombers who plotted to blow up St. Patrick's Cathedral on March 2, 1915: query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9A00E6DB1238E633A... detailed bio at: toncxjo.tripod.com/FrankAbarno.html

comment.author: 63860770@N07
comment._content: Thanks artolog, we will add his first name to the record.
